channel.title: Remote server access?
channel.description:
IN the download list, theres a section called "remote server access"
what does this software do?
can i access my server files from any computer even if my homeComputer is not turned on? i wish i could so i could host my server from any computer...[br][size=1]Posted on: June 10, 2007, 04:53:02 PM[/size][hr]if im bumping this ists becasue about a week ago i posted it
